Jonathan Chia Guangrong, Fund Manager at JCG FundLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 02 Apr 2019Find a mentor to teach you how to manage a pure options portfolio. This gives you about 30% to 40% returns pa for a start.Another popular tool will be forex. Good traders will earn about 5% returns a month. But its a steep learning curve. If you have immerse risk appetite and have some play money, get access into a system that gives you signals to trade bitcoin.0 comments1
